thought: The WHOIS information shows that the domain was recently created and all the registrant information is redacted for privacy. This can be a sign of a potential fraudulent website as it lacks transparency.

There are no hyperlinks extracted from the website, which is unusual for an e-commerce site as they typically have multiple links to product pages, policies, and other important information. I will now check for customer feedback or mentions on social media, which can provide insights into the legitimacy of the site.

There is no social media feedback or mentions of the website, which is suspicious for an e-commerce site supposedly offering significant discounts. Given the unusually low prices, the lack of transparency in the WHOIS data, the absence of hyperlinks on the website, and no social media presence, I now have enough information to determine the legitimacy of the website. The URL https://hmfurniture-eu.com/ is likely a fraudulent site.

observation.reason: The site offers products at unusually low prices claims free shipping on all orders has WHOIS data that lacks transparency with a recently created domain no extracted hyperlinks which is unusual for an e-commerce site and no presence or feedback on social media.
